title: Chancellor Larive assumes position as new Board Chair for Monterey Bay Economic Partnership - News
snippet: “MBEP’s goals — equitable economic development, high-quality educational and health-care systems, and environmental preservation — align with what many of us in this region are working toward,” Chancellor Cynthia Larive said. “Convening local leaders and working together is how we can advance this vision and ensure our communities thrive.” · Campus News · Share on Facebook · Share on LinkedIn · Share on Reddit · Print this Page · Campus News · October 10, 2025 ...

title: UC Santa Cruz chancellor review is underway - Lookout Santa Cruz
snippet: by Hillary Ojeda November 4, 2025November 4, 2025 · Click to email a link to a friend (Opens in new window) Email · Click to share on X (Opens in new window) X · Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Facebook · Click to share on Nextdoor (Opens in new window) Nextdoor · University of California President James Milliken has launched a standard five-year performance review of UC Santa Cruz Chancellor Cynthia Larive, marking her first formal evaluation since her 2019 appointment.

title: About Cynthia Larive – Office of the Chancellor
snippet: Siendo la undécima rectora de la Universidad de California en Santa Cruz, Cynthia Larive encabeza una institución mundialmente reconocida por sus investigaciones de alto impacto, en pos de soluciones interdisciplinarias a los mayores retos mundiales, y por su compromiso con la justicia social ...
